New Day Text.Description1: You can choose how to display the new day text. You can choose between: title, subtitle, chat, actionbar, disabled
New Day Text.Description2: Here you can disable or enable that when a player joins it shows them the current day.

Disabled Feature Text.Description: You can enable or disable the this feature is disabled text.

Sound Effect.Description: You can enable or disable the sound effect on new day

Calendar Block.Description: You can enable or disable the calendar block or change the block to a other one.

Calendar Item.Description: You can enable or disable the right click with calendar item.

Lore.Description: You can disable or customize the item lore here.

Days.Description1: You can choose which day(s) to show on texts and which day should the system watch for the Rewards. You can choose between: player, server

Date System.Description2: You can disable or enable the Date system here.
Date System.Description: Here you can set the default values of the year/month/day.

Advancements.Description: You can enable or disable the advancements.

Reward (EXAMPLE).Description 1: Here you can set at which Day should the reward trigger.
Reward (EXAMPLE).Description 2: Here you can set a Chat Message that will be send to the player.
Reward (EXAMPLE).Message: $6$$l$[$b$$l$Day Counter$6$$l$] $f$Congratulations for reaching this specific day!
Reward (EXAMPLE).Description 3: Here you can set a Command that will be triggered. Available variables: $player$
Reward (EXAMPLE).Command: efeffect give $player$ minecraft:glowing infinitefect give player$ minecraft:glowing infinite
Reward (EXAMPLE).Description 4: Here you can set an EXP amount that will be given to the player.
Reward (EXAMPLE).Description 5: Here you can set an Item that will be given to the player.
Reward (EXAMPLE).Description 6: Here you can set the Amount of the Item what will be given to the player.

Texts.Description: You can customize the texts here. Every text except Title Text what use JSON is using normal color codes.
Texts.Command add (player): $6$$l$[$b$$l$Day Counter$6$$l$] $f$You have added $b$$l$$day$$f$ day(s) to $6$$l$$player$ $f$day(s). Now: $e$$newday$
Texts.Command add (server): $6$$l$[$b$$l$Day Counter$6$$l$] $f$You have added $b$$l$$day$$f$ day(s) to $6$$l$SERVER $f$day(s). Now: $e$$newday$
Texts.Possible Sync: $6$$l$[$b$$l$Day Counter$6$$l$] $6$The mod has $f$$l$detected $6$that this mod was used before the $b$$l$Date Update$6$. If you want you can $b$$l$synchronize $6$your $f$$l$Days and the Date $6$with the $c$$l$/daycounter sync $6$command.
